resources.string: To check the latest course schedule, please click here.

As part of our service, we are the office responsible for the integrity, accuracy and privacy of the official academic record. We can assist you with academic transcripts, degree and enrollment verification, schedule of courses, monitoring the completion of degree requirements and transfer credits.\nOur staff is currently working remotely Monday-Friday 8:30-4:30.

Students have access to their unofficial transcripts on insideWheaton to view current grades and academic history. Students may submit self-addressed envelopes to the Office of the Registrar if they would like copies of their grade reports mailed to them.\nPlease do not call the office about grades: Calling will not speed up the process. Grades will be available once all faculty submit their grades.
Sophomores: All Wheaton students are required to declare a major by the end of their sophomore year. Major declaration forms can be found on insideWheaton.
